actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the energy credit for microturbine property.
short_title: American Microturbine Manufacturing and Clean Energy Deployment Act of 2010

summary.text: American Microturbine Manufacturing and Clean Energy Deployment Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1)  allow a 30% energy tax credit for qualified microturbine property; (2) revise the definition of "qualified microturbine property" to increase the maximum nameplate capacity of such property to 5,000 kilowatts; and (3) eliminate the limitation on such credit based upon kilowatt capacity.

titles.title: American Microturbine Manufacturing and Clean Energy Deployment Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the energy credit for microturbine property.
